label.title: A checkbox to enable ZAF SDK support. See https://zendesk.box.com/s/bys22b6tldnopxuw0g3qhe3nhoaseqqo

helpText.title: Help text to explain the ZAF SDK support option. See https://zendesk.box.com/s/bys22b6tldnopxuw0g3qhe3nhoaseqqo
helpText.value: Check this box if the iframed website requires ZAF SDK support. See the 'Iframes in Apps' topic in our developer documentation.

description.title: Embed any website in your Zendesk Ticket Sidebar
description.value: Embed any website in your Zendesk Ticket Sidebar
